text: @easylec @JohnIceAgency @KM_Kito @EelGroup @WetlandsEurope @Shoal_Org @WWFLeadWater @theriverstrust @GlavenEel @greenleejw @EU_ENV @EU_MARE @dupan_info @EelStewardship @WillemXDekker @SEGandrewK @DefraGovUK @CITES @BorisJohnson @EnvAgency @NatResWales Yeah you’re right eels do survive in the river we are talking about glass eels which need to get to the safety of the ditches dykes and brooks which are blocked by the barriers once they spend a couple of years there they can then come back out to the river

text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/zF0m7JF4Bg

urls.title: Flood and Coastal Engineering | Brunel University London
urls.description: This exciting new funded programme, developed in partnership with the Environment Agency will equip you with the knowledge you need for a successful career in flood risk management.
